variants.Description in input context: phosphorylation of Ser910 and Ser935 is disrupted by multiple Parkinson’s disease-associated mutations.
phosphorylation of Ser910 and Ser935 is disrupted by multiple Parkinson’s disease-associated mutations.

Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using Swiss 3T3 cells.

Readout description.Result Description: The variant NM_032799.4:c.Ser910Ala (p.Ser3100Ala) accumulated within discrete cytoplasmic pools, resembling inclusion bodies.
The variant NM_032799.4:c.Ser935Thr (p.Ser3155Thr) accumulated within discrete cytoplasmic pools, resembling inclusion bodies.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression greater than 80% on day 7.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression less than 50% on day 7.
